Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Adventurer
    Class that contains information, statistics, and inventory for the player character.
    Armor
    Armor object class is a subclass of item that implements methods and fields specific to Armor items.
    CaveNode
    CaveNode class is the building block of the cave adventure.
    CavernControl
    The CavernControl class represents the state of the player being safely in a cavern.
    CombatControl
    CombatControl class contains the majority of functions related to the combat state of the game.
    Helper
    Helper class contains utility methods that are used in common gameplay across several states.
    Item
    Item superclass contains state and methods common to all items
    Monster
    Monster class represents the monsters that will be encountered in the adventure.
    Potion
    The potion class is a general catch-all for healing items.
    StalactiteFightNight
    StalactiteFightNight is the driving class for this game.
    Weapon
    Weapon class is a subclass of Item.
